fr.sii.ogham.core.util.bean

Class RecursiveBeanReadWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.util.bean.RecursiveBeanReadWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanReadWrapper

    public class RecursiveBeanReadWrapper
extends Object
implements BeanReadWrapper
    A wrapper that wraps original bean and all nested property values (only objects, not primitives). The aim is to abstract access to the bean and also to nested properties that are beans.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
